allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial Tauri 2 + React 18 scaffold with all dependencies

- Tauri 2.x backend with Rust: tiberius, tokio-postgres, mysql_async,
  rusqlite, mongodb, tauri-specta, stronghold
- React 18 frontend with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, Zustand,
  TanStack Virtual/Table
- DatabaseConnector trait with 7 engine implementations \(Oracle stubbed\)
- Engine-agnostic schema types, bidirectional type mapping matrix
- Zustand stores: connection, comparison, migration, ui, settings
- Security module with audit logging and credential encryption

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1+2: Core engines, connectors, comparison UIs, and security layer

- Implement DatabaseConnector trait with full SQL Server, PostgreSQL,
  MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB connectors \(Oracle/CosmosDB stubbed\)
- Build schema comparison engine with table/column/index/constraint
  diffing and 21 unit tests
- Build data comparison engine with PK, composite key, hash-based,
  and fuzzy matching strategies plus 26 unit tests
- Expand type mapper to 244 tests covering all 7 engines with
  bidirectional canonical type mapping
- Implement security layer: input validation \(28 tests\), credential
  encryption via Stronghold, profile storage, audit logging
- Build React app shell with collapsible sidebar, tabbed workspace,
  command palette, bottom panel, and dark/light theme
- Add SchemaDiffViewer and DataDiffViewer UI components
- Docker Compose for integration test databases
- 408 total Rust tests passing, TypeScript and Vite builds clean

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5432 -U postgres -c "ALTER USER postgres PASSWORD ''YourPassword123'';")

Bash(cmd.exe /c 'reg add ""HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL16.SQLEXPRESS\\MSSQLServer\\SuperSocketNetLib\\Tcp\\IPAll"" /v TcpPort /t REG_SZ /d ""1433"" /f && reg add ""HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL16.SQLEXPRESS\\MSSQLServer\\SuperSocketNetLib\\Tcp\\IPAll"" /v TcpDynamicPorts /t REG_SZ /d """" /f && reg add ""HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL16.SQLEXPRESS\\MSSQLServer\\SuperSocketNetLib\\Np"" /v Enabled /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f')
Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S tcp:localhost,1433 -E -Q "ALTER LOGIN sa ENABLE; ALTER LOGIN sa WITH PASSWORD = ''YourPassword123'';" -C)
Bash(cmd.exe /c 'reg add ""HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL16.SQLEXPRESS\\MSSQLServer"" /v LoginMode /t REG_DWORD /d 2 /f')
Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S tcp:localhost,1433 -U sa -P YourPassword123 -Q "SELECT ''SA login works!''" -C)
Bash(cmd.exe /c 'net stop ""SQL Server \(SQLEXPRESS\)"" && net start ""SQL Server \(SQLEXPRESS\)""')
Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S "localhost,1433" -E -C -l 10 -Q "ALTER LOGIN sa ENABLE; ALTER LOGIN sa WITH PASSWORD = ''YourPassword123''; SELECT ''SA login enabled'' AS result;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S "localhost,1433" -U sa -P YourPassword123 -C -l 10 -Q "SELECT ''SA connected'' AS result;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S "localhost,1433" -U sa -P YourPassword123 -d UpsertTestSource -C -l 10 -Q "SELECT t.name AS table_name, p.rows AS row_count FROM sys.tables t JOIN sys.partitions p ON t.object_id = p.object_id WHERE p.index_id IN \(0,1\) ORDER BY t.name;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/SqlCmd/sqlcmd.exe" -S "localhost,1433" -U sa -P YourPassword123 -d UpsertTestSource -C -l 10 -Q "
SELECT ''categories'' AS tbl, COUNT\(*\) AS cnt FROM categories UNION ALL
SELECT ''customers'', COUNT\(*\) FROM customers UNION ALL
SELECT ''products'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products UNION ALL
SELECT ''orders'', COUNT\(*\) FROM orders UNION ALL
SELECT ''order_items'', COUNT\(*\) FROM order_items UNION ALL
SELECT ''reviews'', COUNT\(*\) FROM reviews
ORDER BY tbl;")
